pycomms_pay.payment_package.config module

pycomms_pay.payment_package.momo module

class pycomms_pay.payment_package.momo.Momo(api_key, subscription_key, user_id)[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the MTN MoMo API for sending money, checking balance, and verifying transactions.

Attributes:

api_base_url (str): The base URL for the MoMo API. api_key (str): The API key for authentication. subscription_key (str): The subscription key for the MoMo API. user_id (str): The user ID for authentication. session (requests.Session): The requests session for making API calls. token (str): The access token for authenticated requests. auth (str): The base64 encoded authentication string.

get_token()[source]

Retrieves and sets the access token for authenticated requests.

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while fetching the token.

momobalance()[source]

Retrieves the account balance.

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing the account balance details.

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while fetching the balance.

transfer_money(amount, currency, external_id, payer, payee_note, payer_message)[source]

Initiates a money transfer request.

Args:

amount (str): The amount of money to transfer. currency (str): The currency of the amount. external_id (str): The external ID for the transaction. payer (str): The payer’s MSISDN (mobile number). payee_note (str): The note for the payee. payer_message (str): The message for the payer.

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing the response status code and reference ID.

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while initiating the transfer.

verifymomo(txn)[source]

Verifies the status of a MoMo transaction.

Args:

txn (str): The transaction ID to verify.

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing the transaction details.

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while verifying the transaction.

pycomms_pay.payment_package.paypal module

class pycomms_pay.payment_package.paypal.Paypal(username, password)[source]

Bases: object

authorize()[source]

Authorizes the PayPal API and retrieves an access token.

This method performs a POST request to obtain an OAuth2 token for subsequent API requests.

Returns:

None

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while authorizing.

capture_order(order_id: str)[source]

Captures a PayPal order.

Sends a POST request to capture the specified order.

Parameters:

order_id (str) – The ID of the order to be captured.

Returns:

str: The response text from the capture request.

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while capturing the order.

create_order(body: OrderBody)[source]

Creates a PayPal order.

Sends a POST request to create a new order with the specified details.

Parameters:

body (OrderBody) – An instance of OrderBody containing order details.

Returns:

None

Raises:

requests.exceptions.RequestException: If an error occurs while creating the order.

pycomms_pay.payment_package.paystack module

class pycomms_pay.payment_package.paystack.Paystack(test_secret)[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the Paystack API for initializing transactions, verifying transactions, and charging authorizations.

Attributes:

ref (str): The reference ID for the transaction. test_secret (str): The secret key for authentication. base_url (str): The base URL for the Paystack API.

charge_authorization(auth, charge_auth: ChargeAuth)[source]

Sends a request to verify a charge authorization and update the access code.

This method verifies a transaction authorization and retrieves the access code associated with it. It uses the provided authorization and charge details to perform the verification.

Parameters:

  • auth (str) – The authorization reference or token for the charge.

  • charge_auth (ChargeAuth) – An instance of ChargeAuth containing charge details.

Raises:

Exception – If the request fails or the response status code is not 200.

Returns:

None

initialize_transaction(initial_body: InitializeBody)[source]

Sends a request to initialize a transaction and retrieves the access code.

This method initializes a transaction using the provided details and retrieves an access code for further processing. The access code can be used for redirecting the user to the Paystack payment page or for other transaction operations.

Parameters:

initial_body (InitializeBody) – An instance of InitializeBody containing transaction details.

Raises:

Exception – If the request fails or the response status code is not 201.

Returns:

None

verify_transaction(ref)[source]

Sends a request to verify a transaction using the provided reference.

This method verifies a transaction with the given reference and retrieves details about the transaction. If successful, it updates the access_code with the data from the response.

Parameters:

ref (str) – The reference or token for the transaction to be verified.

Raises:

Exception – If the request fails or the response status code is not 200.

Returns:

None

class pycomms_pay.payment_package.Momo(api_key, subscription_key, user_id)[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the MTN MoMo API for sending money, checking balance, and verifying transactions.

Attributes:

api_base_url (str): The base URL for the MoMo API. api_key (str): The API key for authentication. subscription_key (str): The subscription key for the MoMo API. user_id (str): The user ID for authentication. session (requests.Session): The requests session for making API calls. token (str): The access token for authenticated requests. auth (str): The base64 encoded authentication string.

Initiates a money transfer request.
